com.atakmap.android.util

Class AttachmentWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.atakmap.android.util.AttachmentWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AttachmentWatcher
extends java.lang.Thread
    Watches all attachment directories and allows other tools to listen for additions/removals Intentionally does not use FileObserver due to its unreliability See VideoFileWatcher for another example of this implementation
